panel.field: Optimizes <TRA, adds a <TRR command that works the same as <TRA, but doesn't reset player velocity, and also transports in relative coords (so <TRA0001,0002,0003,0004 will still transport to map 1, event 2, x 3, y 4, and <TRR0001,0002,0003,0004 will transport to map 1, event 2 as well, but will instead add 3 to x position in tiles, and 4 to y position in tiles, and if the player is currently moving velocity will be preserved. This allows you to have both seamless transitions as well as relative transitions.
